name: zeobviouslyfakeacc/MiniMods
description: Various little mods. Sometimes with big effects.

releases.name: DisableBreathEffect
releases.description: Removes the annoying 2D breath cloud that appears every few seconds when it's cold.

releases.name: EnableStatusBarPercentages
releases.description: This mod re-enables some labels in the status / first aid screen that show a percentage value of how full the warmth, fatigue, thirst and hunger status bars are.

releases.name: RememberBreakDownItem
releases.description: This mod remembers the tool you last used to break down furniture. That way, you no longer need to constantly switch from "using a knife" to "no tool" when breaking down branches or curtains.

releases.name: WildlifeBegone
releases.description: This mod removes most of the animals that would usually roam the world and greatly increases their respawn times, thus making you play The Long Dark quite a bit differently.
